Desc.entry: A registered charitable organisation offering support to families and carers of those with a learning disability. Provides leisure time activities, training, day service and employment opportunities for people with a learning disability. Day groups for adults, evening activities for all ages. Resources include meeting rooms, sports/leisure facilities and a snoezelen room available for hire Monday-Friday during the day. Offers activities for children on Saturdays and holidays. Runs a website with news, information and a chat room for families and carers. Also offers support planning for people with a budget. Self or any referral.
